short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyze SEO elements of web pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides actionable insights to improve your websiteâ€™s search engine visibility. Whether you need to optimize your images, fix missing meta tags, or boost your internal linking structure, this tool can help you.

Here are the features you can find in it : 

1. SEO On-Page audit: instantly analyze the key SEO elements of any webpage, including page titles, meta descriptions, canonical & the headers.

2. Content analysis: view word count, average sentence length, and the most frequently used words on the page. 

3. Image optimization: identify missing alt attributes and optimize image size and dimensions for faster load times.

4. Link analysis: analyze internal, external, and special links, with warnings for duplicate links and the option to download link data.

5. Main Query analysis: analyze how your target keywords are used in the content, and view a simulated SERP preview with keyword highlights.

All this in one yser-friendly interface. You can easily switch between tabs for a detailed breakdown of general SEO, content, images, links, and query analysis. You can also export the links, frequent words, and images data. At the end you can download a txt file of all the report. 

If you work during late-hours, you can turn on the dark mode for a visually comfortable experience. 

This is an Open Source project. If you like it, review it and let me know ! If you would like me to add new features, that would be with pleasure !
